org.loklak.susi

Class SusiIdea

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.loklak.susi.SusiIdea

  • public class SusiIdea
extends java.lang.Object
    An idea is the application of a rule on a specific input. This matches with the idea of ideas where an idea is the 'sudden' solution to a problem with the hint how to apply the idea's core concept on the given input details. That is what this class does: it combines a rule with the pattern that matched from the input with the rule.
